about_the_game:
Welcome to the electrifying world of "Holobike 3D", where high-speed chases and strategic battles merge into an adrenaline-fueled experience. Inspired by the iconic Tron light cycle battles, this game transports you into futuristic arenas where survival is as much about speed as it is about smarts.



Gameplay Mechanics:
Control your holobike, a sleek, fast-moving vehicle that leaves a deadly trail of light in its wake. Navigate through a variety of maps, each with unique obstacles and challenges. From ramps that send you soaring, anti-gravity zones that test your navigation skills, to wind forces that demand constant adjustment, every map brings a new thrill.



Compete to Survive:
Engage in battles with up to 5 other players, depending on the map. Use your wit and reflexes to encircle opponents with your light trail, creating inescapable traps that lead to their demise. But be cautious, as one wrong turn could be your end.



Master Power-Ups:
Elevate your game with an array of power-ups. Dash to make a quick escape or to close in on an opponent, jump over looming laser walls, teleport to evade traps, and break through barriers to create your path. Phase through obstacles with precision, turning near misses into strategic wins.



Diverse Arenas:
Each map is a unique battlefield, from the visually stunning neon landscapes to the challenging environments equipped with laser break balls and other dynamic obstacles. Strategy is key as you choose the most advantageous paths and power-ups to ensure your victory.



Features:

Intense multiplayer action with up to 6 players.
Diverse power-ups like dash, jump, teleport, wallbreak, and phase.
Variety of maps with unique obstacles including ramps, anti-gravity zones, and more.
Strategic gameplay: Use your light trail to outsmart opponents.
Stunning 3D graphics and neon aesthetics for an immersive experience.
"Holobike 3D" is not just a test of speed, but of strategic thinking and reflexes. Do you have what it takes to dominate the leaderboard and become the ultimate survivor in these neon-soaked arenas? Download now and enter the battle for survival.

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 12 (Monterey)
  • Processor: Apple Silicon (M1, M2, etc) or Intel Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
